sentence: The emails show involvement by numerous MAGA crew, including Mark Finchem, a candidate for secretary of State in Arizona, which is terrifying because should he win, he would oversee elections in Arizona.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Newly uncovered MAGA emails show a sinister conspiracy to refute Biden's win and bestow it on Trump

sentence: Despite the ongoing processes, The Arizona audit discovered over 700,000 ballot discrepancies, and Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem has introduced a resolution to decertify the 2002 Presidential Election.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: Maricopa County Receives Renewed Request For Records Or Information In 2020 Election Investigation – What Are They Hiding Now?
